Method Detail

generateToken

Token generateToken(java.util.List<java.lang.String> scopes,
                    java.lang.String clientId,
                    java.lang.String clientSecred,
                    java.lang.String userName,
                    java.lang.String password)
Generates a new access token for a given user and for given scopes.

This method is used to generate access tokens in the gant type "Resource Owner Basic Credentials".

If no user account is found for these credentials, an error is raised.

Parameters:
scopes - List of objet names the client will access with the token. Could be empty, but not null.
clientId - The client unic identifier. Not used now, must be null.
clientSecred - The client shared secret. Not used now, must be null.
userName - The user account's user name.
password - The user account's password.
Returns:
The generated token.
Throws:
ProtocolException - INVALID_CLIENT_CREDENTIALS: If no user is found for this credentials.
ProtocolException - INVALID_SCOPE: If scopes are specified. Currently, no scopes are supported.
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when scopes or userName parameter is null.

getTokenInformation

Token getTokenInformation(java.lang.String accessToken)
Retrieves all infromation (rights, lifetime, etc...) related to an access token

Parameters:
accessToken - The access token found.
Returns:
The corresponding token, or null if the access token is not found.
